sentences.cn: 锡西不仅驼背，而且又矮又胖。

sentences.en: He used to be dumpy , but he became thin after he grew up.
sentences.cn: 他小时候胖墩墩的, 长大以后却瘦了.

sentences.en: His long dumpy face wrinkled in a scowl.
sentences.cn: 那长下巴的胖圆脸皱起了眉头.

sentences.en: In the fifth frame there is much water, the sixth grid is of the dumpy son.
sentences.cn: 第五格大部分是水, 第六格则是矮胖子的地盘.

sentences.en: The knot is a dumpy, short - legged, wading bird.
sentences.cn: 滨鹬是一种矮胖的短脚涉禽.

trans.tran_en: someone who is dumpy is fat, short, and unattractive
